    13â†’    - This is used to provide consistent project identity of your project, even as the workspace is moved or renamed

```typescript
// Todoå‹å®šç¾©

/**
 * Todoã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã®å‹
 */
export interface Todo {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  description?: string;
  deadline?: string; // ISO 8601å½¢å¼ã®æ—¥ä»˜æ–‡å­—åˆ—
  completed: boolean;
  createdAt: string; // ISO 8601å½¢å¼ã®æ—¥ä»˜æ–‡å­—åˆ—
  updatedAt: string; // ISO 8601å½¢å¼ã®æ—¥ä»˜æ–‡å­—åˆ—
}

/**
 * Todoãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã®å‹
 */
export type TodoFilter = 'all' | 'active' | 'completed';

/**
 * Todoä½œæˆæ™‚ã®å…¥åŠ›ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å‹ï¼ˆidã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒ—ã¯è‡ªå‹•ç”Ÿæˆï¼‰
 */

/**
 * Todoæ›´æ–°æ™‚ã®å…¥åŠ›ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å‹ï¼ˆéƒ¨åˆ†æ›´æ–°å¯èƒ½ï¼‰
 */
export type TodoUpdate = Partial<Omit<Todo, 'id' | 'createdAt'>>;
```

```typescript
import { Todo, TodoInput, TodoUpdate } from './types';

// Local Storageã®ã‚­ãƒ¼å
const STORAGE_KEY = 'todos';

/**
 * Local Storageã‹ã‚‰ã™ã¹ã¦ã®Todoã‚’å–å¾—
 * @returns Todoã®é…åˆ—
 */
export function getTodos(): Todo[] {
  try {
    // SSRå¯¾ç­–: windowã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèª
    if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
      return [];
    }

    const stored = localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY);
    if (!stored) {
      return [];
    }

    const todos = JSON.parse(stored) as Todo[];
    return todos;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Todoå–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
    // JSON parseã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®å ´åˆã¯ç©ºé…åˆ—ã‚’è¿”ã™
    return [];
  }
}

/**
 * ã™ã¹ã¦ã®Todoã‚’Local Storageã«ä¿å­˜
 * @param todos ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹Todoã®é…åˆ—
 * @returns æˆåŠŸã—ãŸå ´åˆtrueã€å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆfalse
 */
export function saveTodos(todos: Todo[]): boolean {
  try {
    // SSRå¯¾ç­–: windowã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèª
    if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
      return false;
    }

    const json = JSON.stringify(todos);
    localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, json);
    return true;
  } catch (error) {
    // Storage quotaè¶…éã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãªã©ã‚’ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒƒãƒ
    if (error instanceof Error) {
      if (error.name === 'QuotaExceededError') {
        console.error('Storageå®¹é‡è¶…éã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
        alert('ä¿å­˜å®¹é‡ãŒä¸è¶³ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ä¸è¦ãªTodoã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚');
      } else {
        console.error('Todoä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
      }
    }
    return false;
  }
}

/**
 * æ–°ã—ã„Todoã‚’è¿½åŠ 
 * @param input Todoä½œæˆæ™‚ã®å…¥åŠ›ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿
 * @returns ä½œæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸTodoã€å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆnull
 */
export function addTodo(input: TodoInput): Todo | null {
  try {
    // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³: ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¯1æ–‡å­—ä»¥ä¸Š100æ–‡å­—ä»¥å†…
    if (!input.title || input.title.length === 0 || input.title.length > 100) {
      console.error('ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¯1æ–‡å­—ä»¥ä¸Š100æ–‡å­—ä»¥å†…ã§ã‚ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™');
      return null;
    }

    const now = new Date().toISOString();
    const newTodo: Todo = {
      id: generateId(),
      title: input.title.trim(),
      description: input.description?.trim(),
      deadline: input.deadline,
      completed: false,
      createdAt: now,
      updatedAt: now,
    };

    const todos = getTodos();
    todos.push(newTodo);

    if (saveTodos(todos)) {
      return newTodo;
    }
    return null;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Todoè¿½åŠ ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
    return null;
  }
}

/**
 * æ—¢å­˜ã®Todoã‚’æ›´æ–°
 * @param id æ›´æ–°ã™ã‚‹Todoã®ID
 * @param update æ›´æ–°ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿
 * @returns æ›´æ–°ã•ã‚ŒãŸTodoã€å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆnull
 */
export function updateTodo(id: string, update: TodoUpdate): Todo | null {
  try {
    const todos = getTodos();
    const index = todos.findIndex((todo) => todo.id === id);

    if (index === -1) {
      console.error('æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸIDã®TodoãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“:', id);
      return null;
    }

    // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã®ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
    if (update.title !== undefined) {
      if (update.title.length === 0 || update.title.length > 100) {
        console.error('ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¯1æ–‡å­—ä»¥ä¸Š100æ–‡å­—ä»¥å†…ã§ã‚ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™');
        return null;
      }
    }

    const updatedTodo: Todo = {
      ...todos[index],
      ...update,
      title: update.title?.trim() ?? todos[index].title,
      description: update.description?.trim() ?? todos[index].description,
      updatedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    };

    todos[index] = updatedTodo;

    if (saveTodos(todos)) {
      return updatedTodo;
    }
    return null;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Todoæ›´æ–°ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
    return null;
  }
}

/**
 * Todoã‚’å‰Šé™¤
 * @param id å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹Todoã®ID
 * @returns æˆåŠŸã—ãŸå ´åˆtrueã€å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆfalse
 */
export function deleteTodo(id: string): boolean {
  try {
    const todos = getTodos();
    const filteredTodos = todos.filter((todo) => todo.id !== id);

    if (filteredTodos.length === todos.length) {
      console.error('æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸIDã®TodoãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“:', id);
      return false;
    }

    return saveTodos(filteredTodos);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Todoå‰Šé™¤ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
    return false;
  }
}

/**
 * Todoã®å®Œäº†çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
 * @param id åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã‚‹Todoã®ID
 * @returns æ›´æ–°ã•ã‚ŒãŸTodoã€å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆnull
 */
export function toggleTodoCompleted(id: string): Todo | null {
  try {
    const todos = getTodos();
    const todo = todos.find((t) => t.id === id);

    if (!todo) {
      console.error('æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸIDã®TodoãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“:', id);
      return null;
    }

    return updateTodo(id, { completed: !todo.completed });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Todoå®Œäº†çŠ¶æ…‹åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
    return null;
  }
}

/**
 * ã™ã¹ã¦ã®Todoã‚’å‰Šé™¤ï¼ˆãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆç”¨ï¼‰
 * @returns æˆåŠŸã—ãŸå ´åˆtrueã€å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆfalse
 */
export function clearAllTodos(): boolean {
  try {
    if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
      return false;
    }
    localStorage.removeItem(STORAGE_KEY);
    return true;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Todoå…¨å‰Šé™¤ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
    return false;
  }
}

/**
 * ãƒ¦ãƒ‹ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãªIDã‚’ç”Ÿæˆï¼ˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒ— + ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ æ–‡å­—åˆ—ï¼‰
 * @returns ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸID
 */
function generateId(): string {
  return `${Date.now()}-${Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 9)}`;
}
```

```typescript
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

/**
 * Local Storageã¨åŒæœŸã™ã‚‹ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯
 * @param key Local Storageã®ã‚­ãƒ¼
 * @param initialValue åˆæœŸå€¤
 * @returns [å€¤, æ›´æ–°é–¢æ•°]ã®ã‚¿ãƒ—ãƒ«
 */
export function useLocalStorage<T>(
  key: string,
  initialValue: T
): [T, (value: T | ((prev: T) => T)) => void] {
  // SSRå¯¾ç­–: åˆå›ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°æ™‚ã¯åˆæœŸå€¤ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
  const [storedValue, setStoredValue] = useState<T>(initialValue);
  const [isClient, setIsClient] = useState(false);

  // ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ã§ã®ã¿Local Storageã‹ã‚‰èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿
  useEffect(() => {
    setIsClient(true);

    try {
      const item = window.localStorage.getItem(key);
      if (item) {
        setStoredValue(JSON.parse(item));
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`Local Storageèª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ (key: ${key}):`, error);
      // ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯åˆæœŸå€¤ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
    }
  }, [key]);

  // å€¤ã‚’æ›´æ–°ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
  const setValue = (value: T | ((prev: T) => T)) => {
    try {
      // é–¢æ•°ã®å ´åˆã¯ç¾åœ¨ã®å€¤ã‚’æ¸¡ã—ã¦å®Ÿè¡Œ
      const valueToStore = value instanceof Function ? value(storedValue) : value;

      // çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’æ›´æ–°
      setStoredValue(valueToStore);

      // ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ã§ã®ã¿Local Storageã«ä¿å­˜
      if (isClient && typeof window !== 'undefined') {
        window.localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(valueToStore));
      }
    } catch (error) {
      // Storage quotaè¶…éãªã©ã®ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚’ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒƒãƒ
      if (error instanceof Error) {
        if (error.name === 'QuotaExceededError') {
          console.error('Storageå®¹é‡è¶…éã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
          alert('ä¿å­˜å®¹é‡ãŒä¸è¶³ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å‰Šæ¸›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚');
        } else {
          console.error(`Local Storageä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ (key: ${key}):`, error);
        }
      }
    }
  };

  return [storedValue, setValue];
}

```

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="Write"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Write**</summary>


```typescript
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react';
import { Todo, TodoInput, TodoUpdate, TodoFilter } from '@/lib/types';
import {
  getTodos,
  addTodo as addTodoToStorage,
  updateTodo as updateTodoInStorage,
  deleteTodo as deleteTodoFromStorage,
  toggleTodoCompleted,
} from '@/lib/storage';

/**
 * Todoç®¡ç†ç”¨ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯
 */
export function useTodos() {
  const [todos, setTodos] = useState<Todo[]>([]);
  const [filter, setFilter] = useState<TodoFilter>('all');
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);

  // åˆå›ãƒã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆæ™‚ã«Local Storageã‹ã‚‰Todoã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿
  useEffect(() => {
    const loadedTodos = getTodos();
    setTodos(loadedTodos);
    setIsLoading(false);
  }, []);

  // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã«åŸºã¥ã„ã¦Todoã‚’ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
  const filteredTodos = todos.filter((todo) => {
    if (filter === 'active') return !todo.completed;
    if (filter === 'completed') return todo.completed;
    return true; // 'all'ã®å ´åˆ
  });

  // Todoã‚’è¿½åŠ 
  const addTodo = useCallback((input: TodoInput) => {
    const newTodo = addTodoToStorage(input);
    if (newTodo) {
      setTodos((prev) => [...prev, newTodo]);
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }, []);

  // Todoã‚’æ›´æ–°
  const updateTodo = useCallback((id: string, update: TodoUpdate) => {
    const updatedTodo = updateTodoInStorage(id, update);
    if (updatedTodo) {
      setTodos((prev) =>
        prev.map((todo) => (todo.id === id ? updatedTodo : todo))
      );
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }, []);

  // Todoã‚’å‰Šé™¤
  const deleteTodo = useCallback((id: string) => {
    const success = deleteTodoFromStorage(id);
    if (success) {
      setTodos((prev) => prev.filter((todo) => todo.id !== id));
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }, []);

  // Todoã®å®Œäº†çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
  const toggleTodo = useCallback((id: string) => {
    const updatedTodo = toggleTodoCompleted(id);
    if (updatedTodo) {
      setTodos((prev) =>
        prev.map((todo) => (todo.id === id ? updatedTodo : todo))
      );
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }, []);

  // çµ±è¨ˆæƒ…å ±
  const stats = {
    total: todos.length,
    active: todos.filter((todo) => !todo.completed).length,
    completed: todos.filter((todo) => todo.completed).length,
  };

  return {
    todos: filteredTodos,
    allTodos: todos,
    filter,
    setFilter,
    isLoading,
    addTodo,
    updateTodo,
    deleteTodo,
    toggleTodo,
    stats,
  };
}

```


```tsx
'use client';

import { useState, FormEvent } from 'react';
import { TodoInput } from '@/lib/types';

// Todoè¿½åŠ ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoFormProps {
  onAddTodo: (input: TodoInput) => boolean;
}

export default function TodoForm({ onAddTodo }: TodoFormProps) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState('');

  // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡å‡¦ç†
  const handleSubmit = (e: FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
    e.preventDefault();

    // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³: ç©ºç™½ã®ã¿ã®å…¥åŠ›ã¯ç„¡åŠ¹
    const trimmedTitle = title.trim();
    if (!trimmedTitle) {
      alert('Todoã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„');
      return;
    }

    // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã®æ–‡å­—æ•°ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
    if (trimmedTitle.length > 100) {
      alert('ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¯100æ–‡å­—ä»¥å†…ã§å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„');
      return;
    }

    // Todoã‚’è¿½åŠ 
    const success = onAddTodo({ title: trimmedTitle });
    if (success) {
      setTitle(''); // å…¥åŠ›æ¬„ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢
    } else {
      alert('Todoã®è¿½åŠ ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ');
    }
  };

  // è¿½åŠ ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯
  const handleAddClick = () => {
    // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ç™ºç«
    const form = document.querySelector('form');
    form?.requestSubmit();
  };

  return (
    <div className="border border-gray-300 p-4 mb-4 bg-white">
      <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="flex gap-2">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={title}
          onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="æ–°ã—ã„Todoã‚’å…¥åŠ›"
          className="flex-1 border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2 text-black"
          maxLength={100}
        />
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={handleAddClick}
          className="border border-gray-300 px-4 py-2 bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200"
        >
          è¿½åŠ 
        </button>
      </form>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```tsx
'use client';

import { Todo } from '@/lib/types';

// Todoã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoItemProps {
  todo: Todo;
  onToggle: (id: string) => void;
  onDelete: (id: string) => void;
}

export default function TodoItem({ todo, onToggle, onDelete }: TodoItemProps) {
  // å‰Šé™¤ç¢ºèªãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°
  const handleDelete = () => {
    if (window.confirm(`ã€Œ${todo.title}ã€ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ`)) {
      onDelete(todo.id);
    }
  };

  return (
    <li className="border border-gray-300 p-3 mb-2 flex items-center justify-between bg-white">
      <div className="flex items-center gap-3 flex-1">
        <input
          type="checkbox"
          checked={todo.completed}
          onChange={() => onToggle(todo.id)}
          className="w-4 h-4 cursor-pointer"
        />
        <div className="flex flex-col flex-1">
          <span
            className={`${
              todo.completed ? 'line-through text-gray-500' : 'text-black'
            }`}
          >
            {todo.title}
          </span>
          {todo.description && (
            <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-1">
              {todo.description}
            </span>
          )}
          {todo.deadline && (
            <span className="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1">
              æœŸé™: {new Date(todo.deadline).toLocaleDateString('ja-JP')}
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
      <button
        onClick={handleDelete}
        className="border border-gray-300 px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 hover:bg-red-100 hover:border-red-300"
      >
        å‰Šé™¤
      </button>
    </li>
  );
}
```

```tsx
'use client';

import { TodoFilter as TodoFilterType } from '@/lib/types';

// ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoFilterProps {
  currentFilter: TodoFilterType;
  onFilterChange: (filter: TodoFilterType) => void;
  stats: {
    total: number;
    active: number;
    completed: number;
  };
}

export default function TodoFilter({
  currentFilter,
  onFilterChange,
  stats,
}: TodoFilterProps) {
  // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’æ±ºå®š
  const getButtonClass = (filter: TodoFilterType) => {
    const baseClass = 'border border-gray-300 px-4 py-2';
    const activeClass = 'bg-blue-100 border-blue-400';
    const inactiveClass = 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100';

    return `${baseClass} ${
      currentFilter === filter ? activeClass : inactiveClass
    }`;
  };

  return (
    <div className="border border-gray-300 p-4 mb-4 bg-white">
      <div className="flex gap-2 flex-wrap">
        <button
          onClick={() => onFilterChange('all')}
          className={getButtonClass('all')}
        >
          å…¨ã¦ ({stats.total})
        </button>
        <button
          onClick={() => onFilterChange('active')}
          className={getButtonClass('active')}
        >
          æœªå®Œäº† ({stats.active})
        </button>
        <button
          onClick={() => onFilterChange('completed')}
          className={getButtonClass('completed')}
        >
          å®Œäº†æ¸ˆã¿ ({stats.completed})
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

```

```tsx
'use client';

import { Todo } from '@/lib/types';
import TodoItem from './TodoItem';

// Todoãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoListProps {
  todos: Todo[];
  onToggle: (id: string) => void;
  onDelete: (id: string) => void;
  isLoading: boolean;
}

export default function TodoList({
  todos,
  onToggle,
  onDelete,
  isLoading,
}: TodoListProps) {
  // ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ä¸­
  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      <div className="border border-gray-300 p-4 bg-white">
        <p className="text-center text-gray-500">èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ä¸­...</p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // TodoãŒç©ºã®å ´åˆ
  if (todos.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="border border-gray-300 p-4 bg-white">
        <p className="text-center text-gray-500">
          TodoãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚æ–°ã—ã„Todoã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
        </p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="border border-gray-300 p-4 bg-white">
      <ul className="list-none">
        {todos.map((todo) => (
          <TodoItem
            key={todo.id}
            todo={todo}
            onToggle={onToggle}
            onDelete={onDelete}
          />
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}

```

```tsx
'use client';

import TodoForm from '@/components/TodoForm';
import TodoFilter from '@/components/TodoFilter';
import TodoList from '@/components/TodoList';
import { useTodos } from '@/hooks/useTodos';

// ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸
export default function Home() {
  const {
    todos,
    filter,
    setFilter,
    isLoading,
    addTodo,
    toggleTodo,
    deleteTodo,
    stats,
  } = useTodos();

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 py-8">
      <div className="container max-w-2xl mx-auto px-4">
        {/* ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ */}

            Todo List
          </h1>

        {/* å…¥åŠ›ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ */}

  );
}
```

```tsx
'use client';

import { useState, FormEvent } from 'react';
import { TodoInput } from '@/lib/types';

// Todoè¿½åŠ ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoFormProps {
  onAddTodo: (input: TodoInput) => boolean;
}

export default function TodoForm({ onAddTodo }: TodoFormProps) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState('');
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é€ä¿¡å‡¦ç†
  const handleSubmit = async (e: FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
    e.preventDefault();

    // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³: ç©ºç™½ã®ã¿ã®å…¥åŠ›ã¯ç„¡åŠ¹
    const trimmedTitle = title.trim();
    if (!trimmedTitle) {
      alert('Todoã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„');
      return;
    }

    // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã®æ–‡å­—æ•°ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
    if (trimmedTitle.length > 100) {
      alert('ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¯100æ–‡å­—ä»¥å†…ã§å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„');
      return;
    }

    // Todoã‚’è¿½åŠ 
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    const success = onAddTodo({ title: trimmedTitle });
    setIsSubmitting(false);

    if (success) {
      setTitle(''); // å…¥åŠ›æ¬„ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢
    } else {
      alert('Todoã®è¿½åŠ ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ');
    }
  };

  // è¿½åŠ ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯
  const handleAddClick = () => {
    const form = document.querySelector('form');
    form?.requestSubmit();
  };

  return (
    <div className="card p-5 mb-4 animate-fade-in">
      <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="flex gap-3">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={title}
          onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="æ–°ã—ã„Todoã‚’å…¥åŠ›..."
          className="input flex-1 text-base"
          maxLength={100}
          disabled={isSubmitting}
        />
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={handleAddClick}
          disabled={isSubmitting}
          className="btn btn-primary min-w-[80px] disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
        >
          {isSubmitting ? 'è¿½åŠ ä¸­...' : 'è¿½åŠ '}
        </button>
      </form>
      {title.length > 80 && (
        <p className="text-sm text-secondary mt-2">
          æ®‹ã‚Š {100 - title.length} æ–‡å­—
        </p>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

```tsx
'use client';

import { Todo } from '@/lib/types';
import { useState } from 'react';

// Todoã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoItemProps {
  todo: Todo;
  onToggle: (id: string) => void;
  onDelete: (id: string) => void;
}

export default function TodoItem({ todo, onToggle, onDelete }: TodoItemProps) {
  const [isDeleting, setIsDeleting] = useState(false);

  // å‰Šé™¤ç¢ºèªãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°
  const handleDelete = async () => {
    if (window.confirm(`ã€Œ${todo.title}ã€ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ`)) {
      setIsDeleting(true);
      // å‰Šé™¤ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ãŸã‚ã«å°‘ã—å¾…ã¤
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 200));
      onDelete(todo.id);
    }
  };

  return (
    <li
      className={`card p-4 mb-3 flex items-center justify-between group animate-slide-in hover:shadow-lg transition-all ${
        isDeleting ? 'opacity-0 scale-95' : ''
      }`}
      style={{ transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }}
    >
      <div className="flex items-center gap-4 flex-1 min-w-0">
        {/* ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ */}
        <div className="relative flex-shrink-0">
          <input
            type="checkbox"
            checked={todo.completed}
            onChange={() => onToggle(todo.id)}
            className="w-5 h-5 cursor-pointer accent-[var(--primary)] rounded"
          />
        </div>

        {/* ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ */}
        <div className="flex flex-col flex-1 min-w-0">
          <span
            className={`text-base font-medium transition-all ${
              todo.completed
                ? 'line-through opacity-60'
                : 'text-[var(--foreground)]'
            }`}
          >
            {todo.title}
          </span>

          {todo.description && (
            <span className="text-sm text-[var(--secondary)] mt-1 truncate">
              {todo.description}
            </span>
          )}

          {todo.deadline && (
            <span className="text-xs text-[var(--secondary)] mt-1 flex items-center gap-1">
              <svg
                className="w-3 h-3"
                fill="none"
                stroke="currentColor"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  strokeWidth={2}
                  d="M8 7V3m8 4V3m-9 8h10M5 21h14a2 2 0 002-2V7a2 2 0 00-2-2H5a2 2 0 00-2 2v12a2 2 0 002 2z"
                />
              </svg>
              æœŸé™: {new Date(todo.deadline).toLocaleDateString('ja-JP')}
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* å‰Šé™¤ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ */}
      <button
        onClick={handleDelete}
        disabled={isDeleting}
        className="btn-danger ml-3 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 flex-shrink-0 transition-opacity disabled:opacity-50"
      >
        {isDeleting ? 'å‰Šé™¤ä¸­...' : 'å‰Šé™¤'}
      </button>
    </li>
  );
}

```

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="Write"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Write**</summary>


```tsx
'use client';

import { TodoFilter as TodoFilterType } from '@/lib/types';

// ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
interface TodoFilterProps {
  currentFilter: TodoFilterType;
  onFilterChange: (filter: TodoFilterType) => void;
  stats: {
    total: number;
    active: number;
    completed: number;
  };
}

export default function TodoFilter({
  currentFilter,
  onFilterChange,
  stats,
}: TodoFilterProps) {
  // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®è¨­å®š
  const filters: Array<{
    value: TodoFilterType;
    label: string;
    count: number;
  }> = [
    { value: 'all', label: 'å…¨ã¦', count: stats.total },
    { value: 'active', label: 'æœªå®Œäº†', count: stats.active },
    { value: 'completed', label: 'å®Œäº†æ¸ˆã¿', count: stats.completed },
  ];

  return (
    <div className="card p-5 mb-4 animate-fade-in">
      <div className="flex gap-2 flex-wrap">
        {filters.map((filter) => {
          const isActive = currentFilter === filter.value;
          return (
            <button
              key={filter.value}
              onClick={() => onFilterChange(filter.value)}
              className={`
                px-4 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium transition-all
                ${
                  isActive
                    ? 'bg-[var(--primary)] text-white shadow-md scale-105'
                    : 'bg-[var(--card-bg)] text-[var(--foreground)] border border-[var(--border)] hover:border-[var(--primary)] hover:scale-105'
                }
              `}
            >
              {filter.label}
              <span
                className={`ml-2 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-bold ${
                  isActive
                    ? 'bg-white/20'
                    : 'bg-[var(--background)] text-[var(--secondary)]'
                }`}
              >
                {filter.count}
              </span>
            </button>
          );
        })}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

```

```
    16â†’export default function TodoFilter({
```

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user is getting an error message from their IDE saying:
"Could not save 'page.tsx'. The file content is newer. Compare your version with the file content version, or overwrite the file content with your changes."

This is a classic IDE conflict message. The IDE thinks the file on disk is newer than what the user has in their editor. This happened because I just wrote the file using the Write tool, so the file's modification timestamp is newer than when the IDE opened it.

The solution is:
1. Tell the user to reload the file from disk in their IDE (discard their editor version and use the disk version)
2. Or confirm that they want me to check what's in their IDE vs what's on disk

Since the user said they didn't make any changes, the best solution is to tell them to reload/revert the file in their IDE to use the version from disk (which I just wrote and is correct).
</details></think>
